name: WizVania
description:
Exploration and precision platformer metroidvania made for the MetroidvaniaMonth Jam 15!  Complete all six challenge areas and return to the hub platform to win!

If a challenge seems impossible, you may not have all the pieces of the puzzle you need, so keep exploring and come back later!  

The web version has some popping in the audio, but I'm writing this at 3am the day the jam ends so I'll fix that at a later date.  There are some other known bugs or minor quirks, but the whole game is beatable in both versions. Overall though the desktop version will run better.
